oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Autographed photograph of Judy Garland, n.d.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An autographed portrait photograph of the American singer Judy Garland (born Frances Ethel Gumm). During her successful career in the entertainment industry, she was a famous singer, actress, and vaudevillian. Garland was born Frances Ethel Gumm on June 10, 1922, in Grand Rapids, Minnesota. She was the youngest child of Ethel Marion (née Milne, 1893–1953) and Francis Avent "Frank" Gumm (1886–1935). Forms part of the Metro Archives Photographs - Historical Collection. 1 b & w photograph.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Garland, Judy
